[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
I feel really fulfilled as a leader and guide. Helping others gives me a sense of purpose.
I can see that. You always seem to know just what to do to make people feel better.
Yeah, I've had a lot of practice over the years. It's just something that comes naturally to me.
Do you remember that time when you were led to a safe place by the commander? You must have felt pretty grateful for his guidance then.
Absolutely. It was a really tough time and I was so relieved to have someone show me the way. I try to pay it forward by being that kind of leader for others.

[MEMORY]

It was like a weight had been lifted off my shoulders.' }
